tokenURI(address,uint256).details: Note this URI may be a data: URI with the JSON contents directly inlined

params.positionManager: The position manager for which to describe the token
params.tokenId: The ID of the token for which to produce a description, which may not be valid

returns._0: The URI of the ERC721-compliant metadata

tokenURI(address,uint256).notice: Produces the URI describing a particular token ID for a position manager

documentation.text: @title Describes position NFT tokens via URI
